title: Is the domain included?
desc: Yes — we register & manage it for you. One simple annual renewal.

title: Do I need to do anything technical?
desc: No — just choose a design, send your info, and approve the preview.

title: Can I change designs later?
desc: Yes, you can switch designs for a small fee if needed.

title: Will my website show up on Google?
desc: Yes — we do basic SEO so search engines can index your pages.

title: What if I want more pages or a blog?
desc: We can add them as paid upgrades.
